name: Slimehack
description:
Arrowkeys to move. Hold spacebar to attack. Escape to pause.

Kill as many slimes as you can before they kill you.

Shoutouts to Clembod and tienlev for the sprites!

Email me at alaricells@gmail.com if you have any suggestions or want to work on the project!

My first game with PhaserJS! Hope you all enjoy it!
